document_data.name: Klaw
document_data.mainbody:
'''Klaw''' was a [[worg]] kept by the [[goblin]] members of the [[cult of the Absolute]].

{{Quote|Dumb as a rock, but world class at tearin' the throats outta wee ones, she is.|Olak, on Klaw.}}
document_data.Description: She was a massive worg of the ''Nordiland worgata'' family. Like others of her kind, she had an absolutely voracious appetite.
document_data.Relationships:
[[File:Klaw_and_Olak.png|thumb|right|300px|''Klaw and her keeper Olak.'']]
Klaw was disciplined and kept in line by Sentinel [[Olak]]. She had several different pups, including [[Small Klaw]] among others.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Klaw was stationed in the outpost outside of the [[Shattered Sanctum]]. Her whelps were kept in the kennels deep within the old [[Sel√ªnite]] temple.
